-----Original Message-----
From: David Lowry [mailto:heedling@...]
Sent: Friday, August 08, 2003 8:09 PM
To: gladiator@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [gladiator] Looking For Game


Check out http://snowstorm.sourceforge.net/cgi-bin/site.cgi for OpenGlad,
which is basically the same game with win support and such.  As for the real
original game..well.. I personally don't know of any sources that have it,
(I lost my folder with Glad and the manual a long time ago, still haven't
managed to find it) but somebody else in this group might, so hang in there.
Or maybe OpenGlad is better than what you hoped for.

gmandaonly1 <gmandaonly1@...> wrote:I have been looking for this game
for a long time. It seems that
forgotten sages is gone. Can anyone here tell me where I can get a
copy, or send me a copy? My email is Gmandaonly1@...
